name: Call of Duty: Black Ops - Annihilation
name_original: Call of Duty: Black Ops - Annihilation
description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops - Annihilation is an action-shooter game developed by Treyarch. It came out on 28-06-2011. It was published by Activision Blizzard. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Call of Duty: Black Ops - Annihilation is available on Xbox 360, PC and PlayStation 3.
